page.title: 09MEDIA IN MILLAND
page.content: there are daily newspaper deliveries to nearly every house, although people with drives usually leave a pipe at their gate for delivery men. the local newspapers covering the area are the haslemere herald and the midhurst observer-these print news and pictures of all local events. a fairly new introduction is the free publication which is delivered whether you want it or not. this is full of local advertisements and promotions as well as stories. there is the weekly messenger and the monthly three counties shopper. it is estimated that every house and many cars have a radio and at least 95% of houses have a television. the 5% without are not the poorest, they just do not want it. news still travels remarkably fast through a village by word of mouth.
